Best Cheap MiG Welders – Top Picks & Reviews

June 7, 2021December 28, 2020 by Brayden
1.6k
SHARES
ShareTweet

No matter whatever the welding need is, whether it’s a DIY project or a garage repair project, even a professional welding task, MIG welders are the best options for every kind of welding requirements.

For this reason, we have gathered all the best budget MIG welders in one list that can best suit your needs and provide the best results based on practical experimentations also upon real-time use. Here are few best cheap MIG welders that are low in price but rich in performance. 

Related: Best Mig Welders Under 300$

LOTOS MIG175

Display4top Portable

List of 7 Best Cheap MiG Welders

Mig welders are cheap and best to buy as they perform heavy and light-duty tasks easily. They provide ultimate performance on a low budget. There are expensive mig welders as well but mostly they are inexpensive, still provide high productivity and speed. Each mig welder selected and mentioned in this list has been chosen on the basis of practicality and experimentations so the reviews stay completely honest also deeply researched.

Best overall

1. LOTOS MIG175

Specifications:

  • Weight: 85 pounds
  • Dimension: 18 x 12.5 x 10.5 inches
  • Input Voltage: 220 volts
  • Amperage Range: 175 Amps
  • Warranty: 1-years
Check On Amazon

Overview:

Lotos MIG175 is the best cheap mig welder that is not only low in price but also portable and compact in size. It has everything that a user requires and gives extremely marvelous quality welds that are splatter-free and nice-and-clean as well.

Lotos MIG 175 is capable of welding aluminum via spool gun which is included for free of cost inside the package and easily welds other materials such as mild and stainless steel etc. This budget-friendly mig welder can weld aluminum of up to 3.8” thinner and mild or stainless steel of about 1/4” thinner.

Another cool thing about this best cheap mig welder is that it is equipped with transformer technology which is used to convert the moderate voltage and moderate current generally 230 or 115 V into a high current and low voltage supply, which is in between 17 and 45 Volts (open-circuit) and 55 to 590 amperes.

This is an extremely useful feature in terms of power-saving mode which not only saves your electricity but also increases the efficiency level.

It utilizes high current input which means that the welds and machine itself is a strong welding machine.  It is a DC mig welder but easily welds aluminum as mentioned earlier.

Furthermore, It is equipped with Thermal Overload Protection which is best to enhance the equipment life by automatically shutting it down upon reaching heating up a level.

Apart from this, Lotos MIG 175 contains Aluminum Wire Feeder that is useful in producing stable and better welds. Other than this, It is an aluminum cheap mig welder that has a high amperage range of around 175 Amperes to weld thick and thin metals.

This welder contains all the basic accessories that are required by a welder such as, MIG torch, Aluminum Spool Gun, Ground Clamp, Gas Hose, Argon Regulator, even a Welding Mask is also included in this super cool mig welder.

To conclude, Lotos MIG 175 is the best budget MIG welder which is ideal for professional weldings as well. Plus the Lotos welder company has also provided peace of mind for their users by giving a 1-year of warranty and a 30-days refund policy. So you can easily buy this mig welder without having any issues.

Pros
  • High Amperage Range
  • 1 year warranty and 30 days refund
  • Argon Regulator Included
  • Can weld Aluminum
  • Thermal Overload Protection
Cons
  • Definitely not for heavy industrial use

Check Price on Amazon
Amazon’s Choice

2. Hobart 500559 Handler 140

Specifications:

  • Weight: 57 pounds
  • Dimension: 19 x 11 x 13 inches
  • Input Voltage: 110 volts
  • Amperage Range: 140 Amps
  • Warranty: 5-years
Check On Amazon

Overview:

The Hobart Handler140 is one of the best cheap MIG welder and most famous ones out there in the market due to its quality, features, and after-sales services. 

It is most popular welding machine. Hobart 140 is equipped with the latest and far most superior and advanced features that are usually hard to see in such kind of low-cost welder.

It is capable of welding aluminum but with the help of gas shielding as with flux core welding, it becomes almost impossible to weld aluminum.  It is also equipped with a high amperage range of 140amps to weld thick/thin metals. 

The duty cycles for this mig welder are 20% at 90amps which can provide continuous weld at full power for almost one minute, however; mostly no one welds for that long and takes breaks between weldings.

Moreover, the 5 voltage control selector is also a unique feature that we get in this welder that provides a stable and smooth arc during different welds.

Despite being a low-cost welder, it still includes required accessories at such a low price. The user gets a free Dual-gauge regulator with gas hose and Sample spool of flux-cored wire and Material thickness gauge plus other accessories for no additional cost.

If we sum up, Hobart Handler 140 is a powerful welding machine that Is capable of welding Steel, Stainless Steel, and Aluminum. If you are looking for a MIG welder that has a massive warranty then this is one of those mig welders. Hobart Handler 140 provides a 5-years of huge warranty and can handle heavy-duty welds as well without any heating issue.

Pros
  • 5-position voltage control
  • Massive Warranty
  • MIG and Flux-Cored Welding
  • High Amperage Range
  • Quick Set up
  • Can weld Aluminum
  • Less welding splatters
Cons
  • Slightly Heavy

Check Price on Amazon
Amazon’s Choice

3. Forney Easy Weld 261

Specifications:

  • Weight: 19 pounds
  • Dimension: 16.7 x 12 x 8.1 inches
  • Input Voltage: 120 volts
  • Amperage Range: 140 Amps
  • Warranty: 1-years
Check On Amazon

Overview:

The cheapest of all in our list of best cheap mig welders, Forney Easy Weld 261 is the best mig welder for starters and for all those users who really want some handy mig welder at their homes to meet emergency welding tasks.

It is a straightforward welder that is extremely easy to use and the best thing about this mig welder is that it is one of the simplest machines available in the market and Forney is a trusted brand as well.

Forney is famous for producing extremely quality machines and it is also famous in terms of ratings and demand.

The best thing about Forney Easy Weld 261 is that it provides infinite voltage control and wire feed speed control in such a low price range to provide perfect and finest quality welds.

Similar to this, it is one of the most lightweight cheap mig welders as well with a total weight of only 19 pounds which makes it extremely portable and easy to carry as well.

The amperage output range of Forney Easy Weld 261 is also amazing in such a price range which is 140Amps to weld thick and thin metals such as mild steel of up to 1/4inch.

It is impossible to provide a warranty against such low priced welder but still, the company has provided one 1-year of full equipment warranty which is tremendously amazing for such low-cost welder.

Forney Easy Weld 261 is an AC cheap mig welder that contains 8′ MIG gun, 8′ ground clamp, and 20A – 15A adapter right in the box.

This inexpensive welding machine is ideal for all kinds of users and DIY projects, maintenance, and for repairing tasks, plus it is ideal to have this unit at home for fun and attention-demanding tasks.

Pros
  • Inexpensive
  • High Amperage Range
  • Extremely lightweight
  • Durable
  • Wire feed speed control and infinite voltage
Cons
  • Gasless/flux-core welding only

Cheapest Mig

4. HITBOX MIG Welder

Specifications:

  • Weight: 19.4 pounds
  • Dimension: 20.08 x 16.14 x 13.39 inches
  • Input Voltage: 220 volts
  • Warranty: 1-years
Check On Amazon

Overview:

The HITBOX MIG welder is an affordable and versatile cheap mig welder that is ideal for users in the sense that it can handle 4 types of welding processes that are TIG, LIFT, ARC, and MIG welding at a low price

The best thing about this mig welder is that it is multi-functioning and provides a lot of features in a single yet powerful machine.  

It is the best cheap mig welder for beginners and pro as well as it is an extremely durable welding machine and provides peace of mind to the user by offering a 1-year warranty.

Moreover, this welder is capable of producingstrong and professional quality welds. It is highly recommended for budget spenders. 

If we look at the features of this mig welder, similar machines carrying such features are more likely to be heavy and costly as well whereas, HITBOX MIG Welder is extremely lightweight and low cost also.

The entire weight of HITBOX MIG Welder is only 19.4 pounds and the price is incredibly less. It is extremely portable not only due to its weight but also due to its size and design.

The kit includes all the basic accessories such as MB15 welding MIG gun, electrode holder, clamp, portable plug, flux-core wire, and all those accessories that are required to start the welding process.

The controls are super-easy and the display is large with a wire-speed voltage display. The unit is dustproof to enhance the overall life and the result is great. Furthermore, it is not only a cheap MIG welder but also offers 100% duty cycles at 130amps and 40% @ 200amps which is great for continuous welding.

So overall, it is the best MIG welder for beginners, hobbyists, and for those who like welding small-duty home-based tasks.  

Pros
  • TIG, Lift, Arc, and MIG welding.
  • Lightweight
  • Dustproof
  • Inexpensive
  • 100% duty cycles at 130amps
Cons
  • Lack of Spool Gun Connector

Amazon’s Choice

5. Lincoln Electric K2278-1

Specifications:

  • Weight: 45 pounds
  • Dimension: 8.82 x 17.99 x 12.8 inches
  • Input Voltage: 115 volts
  • Amperage Range: 20amps
  • Warranty: 1-years
Check On Amazon

Overview:

Lincoln has been there for the past many years and has produced many MIG and other series welders that are top of the line and meet the requirements of users. 

These mig welders are not only affordable but also useful in many situations where such features are required which Lincoln provides in a low price tag.

Lincoln Electric K2278-1 is one of those mig welders which are inexpensive yet powerful enough to carry out simple duty home-based tasks without any issue. 

Lincoln Electric K2278-1 is capable of welding 1/8 in. mild steel and provides great quality welds and it’s less expensive enough that anyone can purchase it as a side machine for garage or other repairing tasks.

It is the best cheap mig welder for DIY tasks and is extremely lightweight as well. It is a portable mig and setting up this machine is also super easy.

The Lincoln Electric K2278-1 is a handy Core cheap mig welder is a great choice for starters and can easily plug into a standard household power supply of 115 Volts.

The amperage range of this mig welder is 20amp with a 1-year warranty on parts and accessories. The compact design of this super easy mig welder makes it convenient to use and move anywhere around the required working area.

Upon unboxing Lincoln Electric K2278-1, the user gets a free clamp, shield, and a sample wire to start the welder right away. Additional accessories can be bought from a local or online store.

Apart from this, it is high rated welding equipment available at online stores as well so you will not have any issue regarding usage and community of this mig welder.

The build quality is great with almost aluminum and metal build and interior cover with plastic thus its lifespan in enhanced due to this.

Moreover, this cheap portable mig welder is covered with overheating protection which turns this welder automatically off upon reaching the heating limit.

Summing up, the Lincoln Electric K2278-1 is a great choice for amateurs and for those who want a low-duty MIG welder just for their home or garage use and don’t want to take heavy-duty jobs from it but need an affordable machine as well.

Pros
  • Easy setup
  • Standard Power Supply
  • Great performance
  • Premium build quality
  • 1-year warranty
Cons
  • The fans are little bit noisy

Cheapest Mig

6. ETOSHA MIG 160

Specifications:

  • Weight: 36.6 pounds
  • Dimension: 8.82 x 17.99 x 12.8 inches
  • Input Voltage: 110 volts
  • Amperage Range: 50-160amps
  • Warranty: 1-years
Check On Amazon

Overview:

Etosha 140 MIG welder is yet another great inexpensive mig which not only an affordable mig machine but also a dual-mode mig welder. It easily operates on the flux-cored wire as well as on gasless mode and it is an extremely stable welding machine that runs on 110 Volts and has 60Hz of frequency.

It is good for mild steel and stainless steel and provides impressive welds. The right amount of voltage consumption and adjustable features make this welder a unique machine in its range.

This Etosha 160 MIG is covered with overload and overheats protection to avoid the heating and overloading issues thus, increasing the overall lifespan of the welder as well as also covered with water splash protection version IP21 which makes this welder waterproof as well.

The welder is equipped with an extremely comfortable hand grip and the easy to start arc provides quick start and stable welds. 

Etosha is getting famous for its quality and premium quality machines that are light in weight and good in performances and it has built up a descent amount of reputation as well in the welding industry despite heavy-duty competition. 

It is a lightweight machine with only 36.6 pounds in total weight and has an advanced cooling system, which ensures better performance as well as durability.

Other than this, it has a large radiator and heavy-duty cooling Fan which is made with a dual-ball bearing mechanism to maximize ventilation and airflow to keep the environment cool.

If we compare this machine with other inexpensive migs in the market then it has a low price but strong features that we usually see in high priced mig welders in terms of stability and performance.

The control panel is easy with a few little buttons on it to make it a user-friendly welder. The kit includes MIG-160 Welding Machine, Welding Spool Wire, Face Mask, Chipping Hammer/ Wire Brush, 2.5M Torch, and other few accessories.

This affordable cheap mig welder machine is largely used in indoor decorations, DIY’s, and other garage jobs and mostly selected by hobbyists and professional welders.

Pros
  • Easy setup
  • Standard Power Supply
  • Water Splash Protection
  • Free Face Mask
  • Adjustable Voltage Features
  • 1-year warranty
Cons
  • Sometimes faces issues while performing high functions

Cheapest Mig

7. Display4top Portable

Specifications:

  • Weight: 18.6 pounds
  • Dimension: 17.8 x 12.1 x 11.7 inches
  • Input Voltage: 110 volts
  • Warranty: Manufacturer warranty
Check On Amazon

Overview:

A fluxed core, gasless inexpensive mig welder, Displaytop portable mig 130 Plus is the last mig welder of our list. It is a strong and durable, yet compact welder which is made up of heavy-duty stainless steel, and the main purpose of this machine is to provide a long-lasting experience.

It is extremely, extremely low in price. You cannot find a mig welder cheaper than this yet it provides Automatic Thermal Safety Protection that is best suited for aluminum, carbon steel, and stainless steel welding.

Moreover, overload Safety Protection of this welding machine at such a low price offers extra safety by turning it off when it gets hot or if the voltages exceed the pre-set range which indirectly increases the overall lifespan of the welder.

Etosha 140 MIG is equipped with a comfortable handgrip, which makes it convenient for the user to carry it anywhere hence it becomes the perfect welder for DIY and repairing tasks.

With this welder, you will get a free welding gun together with on and off safety control, grounding clamp, brush, mask, and various other accessories.

One more thing before coming towards the conclusion, this welder has 35% duty cycles and utilized DC inverter technology to provide best finishing welds.

Furthermore, it has 60Hz frequency rate and an output current of 30 to 120 volts which is great in such price range.

To conclude, it is the best cheap mig welder that has high global demand with great performance and premium welds. So it is ideal for all beginners and mostly best for home-based projects.

Pros
  • Free Weld Mask
  • Great Duty Cycles
  • Good against voltage fluctuations
  • Overload safety protection
  • Internal fan cooling system to avoid overheating
  • Lowest in the price range
Cons

FAQ’s

Various MIG welders are used for different purposes but the best one is that which is not only low in price but rich in features as well. In such a case, Lotos MIG 175 and Hobart 500559 Handler 140 are the best welders for low budgeters who want more features in a small welder.

Cheap mig welders are available widely in all local and online stores. You can either purchase them locally at welding and equipment shops or they can also be purchased at online stores such as eBay and Amazon.

The basic gas required for MIG or MAG welding is Argon (Ar) but generally, Helium (He) is also added to enhance the penetration and liquidness of the weld pool. Argon or the mixture of both is better for welding complex, hard metals. Somehow, O2 or CO2 are also added to increase the stabilization of the arc and quality of welds.

Conclusion

Mig welders are great for general purpose use. They are strong and powerful welders that can work with various applications without any hurdle. This article covers all the best cheap MIG welders that are truly magnificent and extremely powerful to carry out daily routine operations.

All listed welders meet the professional requirements but LOTOS MIG175 and Hobart 500559 Handler 140 are mostly used welders due to their high performance, low price, durability, and brand loyalty.
